imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Square app icon showing the provided gold NCW emblem centered, optimized for high-resolution app icon use (ncw-app-icon.dim_512x512.png)
- Square app icon showing the provided gold NCW emblem centered, optimized for PWA/launcher use (ncw-app-icon.dim_192x192.png)
- Favicon-sized square icon showing the provided gold NCW emblem centered and legible at small size (ncw-favicon.dim_32x32.png)

existing_features.title: Update the UI to display the NCW Adventures logo in user-visible locations: (1) the landing page (PortalHome) near the main heading, and (2) the in-app header (GamificationHeader) so it appears on all non-landing views.

Set the app favicon/app icon to use the NCW Adventures logo by adding appropriate <link rel="icon"> (and related) tags in frontend/index.html that point to logo-derived icon assets in frontend/public.
Generate and include logo-derived icon image variants as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated, suitable for favicon/app icon usage, using the provided uploaded logo as the source.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove/delete previously published versions/releases as requested by user
Set the provided image as the app logo for "NCW Adventures"
Add the uploaded image file (1771343232477.png) to the frontend static assets and treat it as the official NCW Adventures logo, using a stable filename/path that can be referenced across the app.
